概述  软件包   类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 必需 | 可选 详细信息： 元素

darks.orm.annotation
注释类型 Column

@Documented
@Inherited
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface Column

Indicates the attributes of entity class is mapped to a database table column.

Column.java

If the entity class attributes using the annotation, columns of a database table will be according to the notes column name mapped to corresponding to the attribute, if not, the attribute name will default to the database table name. For example: 

 @Column("USER_NAME")
 private String userName;
or you can use like 
 @Column(value = "USER_NAME", nullable = true, insertable = false)
 private String userName;

从以下版本开始：
JDK1.5
版本：
1.0.0 v05/01/2012
作者：
Liu LiHua
另请参见：
Entity, Id

可选元素摘要
 boolean insertable
          If true, when the persistence the entity object, entity class attribute will be saved to the database corresponding to the column.
 boolean nullable
          If true, the database table column can be able to set null otherwise, when saving or update an entity object, it will automatically filter the attribute. default false.
 boolean queryable
          If true, when query the entity object, the value of database table column will be setted to the entity class corresponding to the attribute.
 boolean updatable
          If true, when update the entity object, entity class attribute will be updated to the database corresponding to the column.
 java.lang.String value
          database table column name.
 

value

public abstract java.lang.String value
database table column name. Required.

默认值：
""

nullable

public abstract boolean nullable
If true, the database table column can be able to set null otherwise, when saving or update an entity object, it will automatically filter the attribute. default false. Optional.

默认值：
false

insertable

public abstract boolean insertable
If true, when the persistence the entity object, entity class attribute will be saved to the database corresponding to the column. Otherwise, the attribute will be ignored or filter. default true. Optional.

默认值：
true

updatable

public abstract boolean updatable
If true, when update the entity object, entity class attribute will be updated to the database corresponding to the column. Otherwise, the attribute will be ignored or filter. default true. Optional.

默认值：
true

queryable

public abstract boolean queryable
If true, when query the entity object, the value of database table column will be setted to the entity class corresponding to the attribute. Otherwise, the value will be ignored or filter. default true. Optional.

默认值：
true

 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架
